ModMetaData.name: AK-47 by Wololooo
ModMetaData.author: wololooo
ModMetaData.description:
The AK-47 is a relic from a time few remember, and fewer still believe ever truly existed. Forged in the twilight of Old Earth's final age, it was born not in glory, but in necessity — a response to decades of war, failure, and fading empires.
Old Earth — the first home of humanity, now little more than myth — was said to have burned beneath storms of ash and steel. In those dying years, the Soviet Union crafted the AK-47: a rugged, brutally simple rifle designed by Mikhail Kalashnikov and chambered in the 7.62×39mm intermediate round. It was not elegant. It was not advanced. But it endured.
Where other weapons jammed or shattered, the AK-47 kept firing. It became a tool of rebellion, of empire, of survival — spreading across continents, then stars, before the great collapse erased nearly all traces of its origin.
Centuries later, fragments of the rifle’s schematics were recovered from a derelict freighter adrift in deep void. Scorched files. Obsolete code. Just enough for a stubborn weaponsmith to rebuild a legend.
Now, on the broken worlds of the Rim, the AK-47 walks again. Not rare. Not perfect. Just real.
A weapon from the mythic cradle of mankind. Reborn in rust and blood. Still here.
~wololooo
